medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain onset around noon today, coming on gradually and being constant and sharp, but has since resolved to a dull pain. The pain started when he ate for the first time during the day and is exacerbated by movement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation s/p ablation, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with subaortic stenosis, hypertension, benign prostatic hyperplasia, history of kidney stones.
medical_history.family_history: Father: embolism age ___; Mother: died ___; 5 healthy children.
